News.Entry:
- Improved stability (Memory management) - Failed to save fixes for big worlds
[https://forums.keenswh.com/threads/update-1-194-5-stability-performance.7404053/ More Info] Change log

- Improved stability (Memory management) - Fixed unable to start Planet scenarios
[https://forums.keenswh.com/threads/update-1-194-5-stability-performance.7404053/ More Info] Change log

- Improved stability (Memory management) - Fixed issues with Yaw and Roll settings on projector - Fixed game stutters when changing block values in terminal screen - Added protection against loading of tampered with worlds with uncounted PCUs
[https://forums.keenswh.com/threads/update-1-194-5-stability-performance.7404053/ More Info] Change log

- Improved Stability (Memory management) - Fixed an issue with world load failing - Fixed multiple crashes in character replication - Fixed game freezing up upon crash when crash reporting fails
[https://forums.keenswh.com/threads/update-1-194-5-stability-performance.7404053/ More Info] Change log

- Improved Stability (Memory management) - Improved searching and filtering in Workshop Browser - Fixed an issue with world load failing
[https://forums.keenswh.com/threads/update-1-194-5-stability-performance.7404053/ More Info] Change log

- Improved Stability (Memory management)
[https://forums.keenswh.com/threads/update-1-194-5-stability-performance.7404053/ More Info] Change log

- Improved Stability (Memory management) - Fixed an issue with world save failing - Fixed an issue with station despawning - Fixed a crash in sensors - Fixed a crash in placing blueprints
[https://forums.keenswh.com/threads/update-1-194-5-stability-performance.7404053/ More Info] Change log

- Fixed a crash preventing some worlds from loading - Fixed remote control waypoint actions not saving - Fixed leftover red debug box appearing in some worlds - Fixed various other crashes
[https://forums.keenswh.com/threads/update-1-194-5-stability-performance.7404053/ More Info] Change log

- Fixed a crash in the game interacting with mod.io - Stability improvements
[https://forums.keenswh.com/threads/update-1-194-5-stability-performance.7404053/ More Info] Change log

- Fixed a couple of ship toolbar problems, including inability to add actions - Improved OG Xbox render performance in large worlds via shadows and particles reballance - Fixed multiple sources of micro-stutters - Stability improvements
[https://forums.keenswh.com/threads/update-1-194-5-stability-performance.7404053/ More Info] Change log

- Added Xbox Experimental mode - Improved graphics quality on Xbox One and S - Added planets Triton, Europa, Titan, Alien
[https://forums.keenswh.com/threads/update-194-3-experimental-mode.7403998/ More Info] Change log

- Fixed falling through the ground - Fixed color changing with dpad not working - Fixed title resumes correctly after suspension - Fixed Xbox Live Gold upsell messaged not being displayed to Silver accounts
[https://forums.keenswh.com/threads/update-1-194-1-xbox-release.7403838/ More Info] Change log

Enjoy the game! [https://forum.keenswh.com/threads/7403838 More Info]
We are working to resolve a number of critical gameplay issues.
We are also actively investigating: - PCU limits - Dedicated servers Change log
